name: monstropolis preview
description:
updated:

* you can now throw hostages and vehicles at ALL floors and buildings.

*Monster takes damage

*Monster regains health when eating hostages

*You can now control the hands independently using A,S,D & L buttons.

* No longer need to click the hands when performing a smash or grab move, this is only necessary when holding a hostage or vehicle.

* Level doesn't crash on level 6, it will now just repeat level 5 until I start creating the other levels.

* Level transition added when a level completed.

* Space bar will restart the game.

*Slight improvement to the movement of attached arms.

Now that most of the playable elements are now here, smash, grab, characters and vehicles, this is what i have made so far, and it has been a very long process, and there is still some way to go but its getting there.

Bugs are expected so any troubles then just press the space bar to restart the game, and not everything will work 100%, consider this an "Alpha Build" of the project.

Whats left to do as i know so far is this:

*Character State Animations(Running,shooting etc)

*Sprite Collisions masks(better detection on grabs & smash)

*Level Progression

*Score

*Music & Sound Effects

As i work through those elements there may be more added dependent on any problems i run into.
